function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Zoonotic transmission from live wild animal trade market","Impact":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases from animals to humans","Mitigation":"Regulation and monitoring of live animal trade markets, and public health education","Technologies":"Surveillance and tracking technology, health monitoring devices","People":"Workers in live animal markets, general public","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Asymptomatic transmission of COVID-19","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying carriers of the virus, leading to uncontrolled spread","Mitigation":"Widespread testing, contact tracing, and mandatory quarantine for close contacts","Technologies":"Rapid diagnostic tests, contact tracing apps, quarantine monitoring systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers, close contacts of infected individuals","Owner":"Health authorities, governments, healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"International travel contributing to the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Global dissemination of the virus across different countries and regions","Mitigation":"Travel restrictions, health screenings at entry points, mandatory quarantine for travelers","Technologies":"Biometric scanners, thermal imaging cameras, travel history databases","People":"Travelers, airport staff, local populations","Owner":"Government, aviation authorities, border control agencies"}]}
